瞉字的基本解释

瞉
kòu
古同“怐”。

瞉
jì
久视。

瞉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kòu］
［《廣韻》苦候切，去候，溪。］
见“瞉霿”。

瞉字的康熙字典解释

【午集中】【目字部】　瞉； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页814第03
【廣韻】苦?切【集韻】丘堠切，?音?。瞉霧，鄙吝心不明也。　又通作傋。【荀子·儒效篇】愚陋傋瞀。【註】傋瞀，無知也。俗本譌作溝。【前漢·五行志】不敬而傋，霿之所致也。　又【集韻】通作怐。【楚辭·九辯】直怐愗而自苦。【註】愚貌。遘?二音，怐愗與瞉瞀義同。【釋文】作?。互詳瞀字註。　又【集韻】或作佝。怐愗，或从人作佝。　又【集韻】居?切，音構。義同。　又【玉篇】古例切，音計。【篇海】久視也。　【字彙補】譌作?。註云：?瞀，無睱也。通作瞉，非。

瞉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
瞉字的起名意思

暂无。

[Afternoon Concentration] [Headword Department] 　瞉; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 814 03
[Guang Yun] Bitter? Cut [Ji Yun] Qiu Kou cut, "Yin?". Fog, contemptuous and unclear.　It's all over again. [Xunzi · Confucianism] Stupid and sloppy. [Note] Suspicion is ignorant. The common version of Jiao Zuogou. [Previous Han·Five Elements History] Irrespectful and sloppy, it was also caused by Aizhi.　 [Ji Yun] All over Zuo Dian. [Songs of Chu·Nine Debates] Straightforwardly confused and suffering. [Note] Foolishness. The second sound of 遘遘怐愗 has the same meaning as 瞉瞀. [Explanation] For?. Mutual details of the word note.　 [Ji Yun] or as a quack.怐怐怐愗, or stubborn from others.　 [Ji Yun] Ju? Cut, sound structure. The same meaning.　[Jade articles] Ancient case cut, sound meter. 【Pianhai】Liu Shi also.　【Word Supplement】Zhao Zuo?. Note to the cloud:? You, there is no such thing. All for silly, no.
